      • fromUtf8

        public static String fromUtf8(byte[] bytes)
        Optimized UTF8 decoder. Here is a benchmark comparison with the JDK implementation (see EncodingBenchmark.java in the benchmark project): EncodingBenchmark.stringDecode thrpt 10 16759798.463 ± 343505.144 ops/s EncodingBenchmark.fastStringDecode thrpt 10 17413298.464 ± 301756.867 ops/s
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        Returns:

      • fromUtf8

        public static String fromUtf8(byte[] bytes,
                              int startIdx,
                              int length)

      • toUtf8

        public static byte[] toUtf8(String str)
        Optimized UTF8 string encoder. comparison with the stock JDK implementation (see EncodingBenchmark.java in the benchmark project): EncodingBenchmark.stringEncode thrpt 10 9481668.776 ± 252543.135 ops/s EncodingBenchmark.fastStringEncode thrpt 10 22469383.612 ± 898677.892 ops/s
        Parameters:
        str -
        Returns:
